Name: Oriental Tartini
Ingredients: 3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist &/or skewered lychee.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A sour, tart, fruity cocktail with more than a hint of lychee.
Nutrition: One serving of Oriental Tartini contains 150 calories
